Beyond 8
The premier events production agency
servicing the fashion, music and tech industries.
About
Beyond 8 was founded by Brittney Escovedo in 2016.

Brittney had been a fixture in the NY live events industry for over 8 years. In that time, she has assembled a team of innovative designers to create stunning events for social, corporate, and not for profit events of all scales. New York, nationwide,or International Beyond 8 has the vision to execute your event.

With an expert team of producers and managers, Beyond 8 can produce whatever your imagination wishes to express. Our team of producers have long standing relationships with the city's best vendors, venues, and specialists to ensure your wishes are fulfilled

Great ideas and planning alone can't deliver a final product. Our craftsmen and programmers work with clients to ensure your guests get the most out of your event and your message is made with maximum impact. Beyond 8 understands that having the right people on the job can make all the difference
